member.name: T:System.CacheManager
member.summary: Helps using the System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache class A Dispose is called on cache expiration if a IDisposable object is being removed from cache The module is thread safe

member.name: P:System.CacheManager.EmitsDebugTrace
member.summary: If enabled, an Information trace entry will'be written on every cache request

member.name: M:System.CacheManager.GetOrDrillShort``1(System.Func{``0},System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: 1 minute cache Returns the cached value or drill the cache with your Func and than returns the new value

member.name: M:System.CacheManager.GetOrDrillLong``1(System.Func{``0},System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: 30 minute cache Returns the cached value or drill the cache with your Func and than returns the new value

member.name: M:System.CacheManager.GetOrDrillShortSliding``1(System.Func{``0},System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: 1 minute cache Returns the cached value or drill the cache with your Func and than returns the new value Sliding expiration
